Reviews.Title: Wish mine worked
Reviews.Author: Damonius
Reviews.Content: I was so excited when I found this deal. This TV was exactly what I was looking for. I received it yesterday and it worked halfway through its first movie and hasn't worked right since. It's like it freezes or something. The picture stops and then slowly goes grey. When this happens I can't even access the menu or adjust the volume. I have to just shut it off. If I let it "rest" for a few hours it will work for a few minutes and then go gray again.I have to assume that my TV is a lemon, and if it worked I would give this item a much higher rating. I was very happy with the picture (while it was working), and the set itself looks slick.

Reviews.Title: Awesome...
Reviews.Author: T.K. "Mr. B"
Reviews.Content: Great LCD.  I have a Sharp Aquos 32" and Mitsubishi projection.  All sets are being run on HD and TIVO boxes, the picture on this set is great for its size and price point.  Totally acceptable great picture.  Easy to use menus.

Reviews.Title: Great LCD TV
Reviews.Author: A. Izzo
Reviews.Content: The best television I have ever bought. Works great, perfect picture, no complaints here

Reviews.Title: This Sucks big time!
Reviews.Author: LIL LISA
Reviews.Content: I bought this item thinking i would set it up for Thanksgiving dinner. It worked, but two days later the screen went black as  night. I thought it was me, but no it was the tube. I even took it to work and the same thing showed. (A fact) is to keep your bucks,and don't buy this TV! Good price BAD PRODUCT!

Reviews.Title: Great TV - Bad Computer Monitor
Reviews.Author: Ragtop Girl
Reviews.Content: Works great as tv - poor computer monitor.  I ordered this to use as a monitor for my laptop and also as a tv.  However, the ONLY computer resolution it can use is 800x600 which on a 19" screen is way too grainy and made my eyes hurt.  I discussed with Maganavox tech and admitted it was a problem.  I returned and am now shopping for a computer monitor with tv tuner.

Reviews.Title: Best deal out there
Reviews.Author: Hank Miller
Reviews.Content: We purchased this TV for use at trade shows.  Excellent portability, nice bright picture, and unlike a lot of other TV's in this size, decent sound.  Purchased a cheap 26 inch wheeled suitcase and some foam padding to use as a transport and storage case.  Works great!

Reviews.Title: This product was defective
Reviews.Author: Thomas G. Holevas
Reviews.Content: I was unable to get a picture on this TV.  User support was available on the phone, but their conclusion was that this product was defective, and they suggested I investigate the warranty.  I sent back to Amazon for a full refund.  The transaction ended up being painless, but frustrating.

Reviews.Title: WELLLLL.....
Reviews.Author: B. Deveaux "BSDj"
Reviews.Content: I got mine about a year and some months ago.  It was a great TV for the price - while it worked!I enjoyed the space saver with all its possible connections/functions.  I could connect my stereo, DVD player and laptop to it with no problem.  Even with all the possibilities of it being used it was hardly used (my wife and I have a very busy schedule outside of home). Then one Friday evening preparing for movie night with my wife (and we have no kids to blame), the thing would not cut on.  I tried looking for a site that may offer some technical assistance but to no avail. (By the way, if you know anything about televisions (LCD) or where I can get help please post.)  I can't lie, though, I am disappointed but I really miss it.  I am still indecisive as to whether to fix it or just get a new one (HELP!)If you decide to buy be aware that you will enjoy only as long as it lasts.
